imageDiff.title: Image Compare Pro
imageDiff.description: Compare images side by side, overlay or switch between them to see differences clearly
imageDiff.verticalLayoutTip: Images are displayed vertically due to space constraints
imageDiff.exitTip: Click outside the window to exit
imageDiff.quickCompareTip: Tip: You can select two images at once to start comparing quickly
imageDiff.supportedFormats: Supports common image formats like JPG, PNG, WebP, file size not exceeding 20MB
